public class SimpleExportDialog
extends JOptionPane

An "Export" dialog for saving components as graphic files.

$Id: SimpleExportDialog.java,v 1.6 2003/02/19 18:17:03 duns Exp $

public SimpleExportDialog(String creator)
Creates a new instance of SimpleExportDialog with all the standard export filetypes.

Parameters:
creator - The "creator" to be written into the header of the file (may be null)

public SimpleExportDialog(String creator,
                          boolean addAllExportFileTypes)
Creates a new instance of SimpleExportDialog.

Parameters:
creator - The "creator" to be written into the header of the file (may be null)
addAllExportFileTypes - If true registers all the standard export filetypes

Set the Properties object to be used for storing/restoring user preferences. If not called user preferences will not be saved.

public void showExportDialog(Component parent,
                             String title,
                             Component target,
                             String defFile)
Show the dialog.

Parameters:
parent - The parent for the dialog
title - The title for the dialog
target - The component to be saved.
defFile - The default file name to use.

selectFile

protected String selectFile()
Called to open a "file browser". Override this method to provide special handling (e.g. in a WebStart app)

Returns:
The full name of the selected file, or null if no file selected

writeFile

protected boolean writeFile(Component component,
                            ExportFileType t)
                     throws IOException
Called to acually write out the file. Override this method to provide special handling (e.g. in a WebStart app)

Returns:
true if the file was written, or false to cancel operation
IOException
